name: Zebra2 Preset
summary: Learn about .H2P files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: In Windows, H2P preset files are located in the following directory: \​VstPlugins\​u-he\​Zebra2.data\​Presets\​Zebra2
In OS X, H2P preset files are located in the following directory: MacHD/​Library/​Audio/​Presets/​u-he/​Zebra2

description: Preset format used by Zebra2, a virtual studio technology (VST) synthesizer plugin that is designed to be added on to DAWs such as Steinberg Cubase or Avid Pro Tools; stores audio settings, including the preset author and usage, in a text-editable format.
